description: A stunning strike from Reyes Cleary was cancelled out by a fine Tyrese Shade effort as Eastleigh hit back for a 1-1 draw against Hartlepool in the National League.
title: Eastleigh 1-1 Hartlepool United
title_page: Eastleigh 1-1 Hartlepool United: Match report - BBC Sport
maintext:
A stunning strike from Reyes Cleary was cancelled out by a fine Tyrese Shade effort as Eastleigh hit back for a 1-1 draw against Hartlepool in the National League.
Cleary struck from distance to give Pools a 30th-minute lead at the Silverlake Stadium but Shade responded before the break by lobbing the ball over the defence and then chipping goalkeeper Adam Smith.
Joe Grey missed a good chance to put Hartlepool back ahead and both sides hit the bar in the closing stages as they chased a late winner.
Eastleigh's Ben Close was the first to hit the woodwork with a powerful drive before a Cleary cross was deflected onto the goal frame at the other end.
